title: MiniApp Manifest JSON Schema
description: JSON Schema for the valiation of MiniApp Manifest document

dir.description: The base direction of the manifest.

icons.description: An array of icon objects that can serve as iconic representations of MiniApps.

sizes.description: A string consisting of an unordered set of unique space-separated tokens which are ASCII case-insensitive that represents the dimensions of an image for visual media.

src.description: An image is a URL from which a user agent can fetch the icon's data.

label.description: The alternative textual descripion of the icon.

lang.description: The value of lang here takes the value of Language-Tag defined in the [BCP47].

short_name.description: A short version of the name of the MiniApp.

description.description: A textual description for the MiniApp representing the purpose of the web application in natural language.

app_id.description: A string that identifies the MiniApp univocally.

color_scheme.description: A string that indicates the preferred color scheme of the MiniApp.

device_type.description: An array of strings that indicates the type of devices on which the MiniApp is intended to run.

code.description: A non-negative integer that identifies the version of a MiniApp.

name.description: A string that identifies the version of a MiniApp in a user-friendly way.

min_code.description: A non-negative integer that identifies the minimum platform version required for running the MiniApp.

target_code.description: A non-negative integer number that indicates the target supported version of the MiniApp user agent's platform.

release_type.description: A string that indicates the release type of the target platform version required for running the application.

pages.description: An array of path strings used for specifying which pages are included in MiniApp. Each item in the array represents a page route.

min_platform_version.description: If not set, it's identical to the MiniApp platform version by default.

background_color.description: String with the Window background color represented in sRGB format.

design_width.description: A non-negative integer specifying the width of the baseline page design (in pixels).

navigation_bar_background_color.description: Navigation bar background color in sRGB format

navigation_bar_text_style.description: Text style of the navigation bar (white or black).

navigation_bar_title_text.description: String with the title of the navigation bar.

navigation_style.description: String with the style of the navigation bar.

on_reach_bottom_distance.description: Integer that indicates the distance for pull-up bottom event triggering (in pixels).

orientation.description: String that indicates the screen orientation configuration (portrait, landscape).
